company_updates_collection.description:
AI in healthcare continues to naturally progress as new tools evolve. Mpirik firmly believes in technology and physicians enabling one another to solve for better patient care, specifically cardiac patients at risk. 

Read more in the JAMA Health Forum about how “Physicians’ knowledge and insights will remain an important complement to these powerful tools.”

https://lnkd.in/dsY_wbYh

Tune in to part 3 of Vizient, Inc's Modern Practice Podcast discussing AI and identifying the risk of sudden cardiac arrest.

https://lnkd.in/eXgipBrn

“The data of what the program has done so far has been pretty astounding….5 patients have received a device implant which wouldn’t have been done without having the program alert in place.” Dr. Sanjaya Gupta stated on Vizient, Inc's latest Modern Practice Podcast.

Tune in to part 2 of the podcast to hear more about how Mpirik uses #AI to identify patients at risk of sudden cardiac arrest.

https://lnkd.in/evpGuCq5

“Mpirik provides a great way to use AI to improve patient care, quality outcomes reducing death, and produce financial margins. So in many cases it’s really a home run..." Douglas Beinborn stated on Vizient, Inc's latest Modern Practice Podcast.

Tune in to part 1 of the podcast to hear more about how Mpirik uses #AI to identify patients at risk of sudden cardiac arrest. 

https://lnkd.in/dRDbabAw

Mpirik was honored to participate in Vizient, Inc's Innovative Technology Exchange earlier this month in Dallas TX! We believe utilizing technology is on the forefront of exceptional patient care and outcomes. 

Partner with Mpirik to learn more about how our AI identifies at-risk patients across the cardiovascular service line.

https://lnkd.in/gSE2zF7V

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
October is Sudden Cardiac Arrest Awareness Month!

#SuddenCardiacArrest claims one life every 90 seconds and the likelihood of surviving is related to the speed of efforts to revive the heart, but half of sudden cardiac arrest victims won’t have someone nearby to help.

Help you patients under stand sudden cardiac arrest and quick actions they can do to help save lives with our #CardioSmart infographic ➡️ https://bit.ly/3olfz6Z

company_updates_collection.description:
Come see Mpirik, a leader in AI Cardiac Care Management, at Vizient, Inc Technology Exchange, booth 314 on Oct. 17th in Dallas, TX! 

#ai #CardiacCare #healthsystems #cardiacdisease #SCAawarenessMonth #prevention #savelives

356,000 out-of-hospital cardiac arrests annually in the U.S. and nearly 90% of them are fatal. Mpirik strives to help bring a new way to address the barriers to appropriate patient care for SCA risk and heart failure. Innovation can change lives and we invite your health system to join our journey. 

#SCAawarenessMonth #HeartFailure #AI #Cardiac #Patients

Mpirik Achieves HITRUST Risk-based, 2-year Certification to Manage Risk, Improve Security Posture, and Meet Compliance Requirements
 
HITRUST Risk-based, 2-year Certification validates Mpirik is committed to meeting key regulations and protecting sensitive information
       
Mpirik, a leading provider of Cardiac AI Care Management, today announced the Mpirik Platform has earned Certified status for information security by HITRUST.

HITRUST Risk-based, 2-year (r2) Certified status demonstrates that Mpirik’s Platform has met key regulations and industry-defined requirements and is appropriately managing risk. This achievement places Mpirik in an elite group of organizations worldwide that have earned this certification. By including federal and state regulations, standards, and frameworks, and incorporating a risk-based approach, the HITRUST Assurance Program helps organizations address security and data protection challenges through a comprehensive and flexible framework of prescriptive and scalable security controls.

“The HITRUST Assurance Program is the most rigorous available, consisting of a multitude of quality assurance checks, both automated and manual,” said Bimal Sheth, Executive Vice President, Standards Development & Assurance Operations, HITRUST. “The fact that Mpirik has achieved HITRUST Risk-based, 2-year Certification attests to the high quality of their information risk management and compliance program.”

Our principal findings at #TCT2022 showcase that moderate mitral regurgitation may rapidly progress to severe and is associated with significant cardiovascular mortality.

Check out further details of our latest research presented at #TCT2022 with our partners, Boulder Community Health.

Mpirik Achieves HITRUST Risk-based, 2-year Certification to Manage Risk, Improve Security Posture, and Meet Compliance Requirements
 
HITRUST Risk-based, 2-year Certification validates Mpirik is committed to meeting key regulations and protecting sensitive information
       
Mpirik, a leading provider of Cardiac AI Care Management, today announced the Mpirik Platform has earned Certified status for information security by HITRUST.

HITRUST Risk-based, 2-year (r2) Certified status demonstrates that Mpirik’s Platform has met key regulations and industry-defined requirements and is appropriately managing risk. This achievement places Mpirik in an elite group of organizations worldwide that have earned this certification. By including federal and state regulations, standards, and frameworks, and incorporating a risk-based approach, the HITRUST Assurance Program helps organizations address security and data protection challenges through a comprehensive and flexible framework of prescriptive and scalable security controls.

“The HITRUST Assurance Program is the most rigorous available, consisting of a multitude of quality assurance checks, both automated and manual,” said Bimal Sheth, Executive Vice President, Standards Development & Assurance Operations, HITRUST. “The fact that Mpirik has achieved HITRUST Risk-based, 2-year Certification attests to the high quality of their information risk management and compliance program.”

Our principal findings at #TCT2022 showcase that moderate mitral regurgitation may rapidly progress to severe and is associated with significant cardiovascular mortality.

Check out further details of our latest research presented at #TCT2022 with our partners, Boulder Community Health.

Today, we are thrilled to announce that we've been acquired by Tempus Labs, Inc.. By joining Tempus, we will accelerate our ability to develop algorithms and solutions to identify patients with undiagnosed or undertreated cardiovascular disease. We share in the vision that data-driven solutions and artificial intelligence hold promise to solving these issues.

We’re extremely appreciative of our partners and customers who have been part of our journey thus far, and all those who will be part of this next chapter, working together to help patients and advance the quality of healthcare.
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description: #NEWS: Today, we announced that we’re welcoming Mpirik to the Tempus family. This acquisition significantly expands our portfolio of AI solutions that help physicians identify patients with undiagnosed or under treated cardiovascular disease and significantly scales deployment capabilities of these solutions to Mpirik’s provider network. To learn more, read on: https://tempus.co/3J6upbC

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: Physician | Redesigning Healthcare | Transforming Delivery of Care
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
#Redesigning_healthcare #48

"Where you live shouldn't determine whether you live or die"
- Bonno

Artificial Intelligence is not the cure to all, but certainly (one of many) means to the end: consistently high quality, equitable care for our communities.

❓ Is this doable?

✔️ Yes!

We have been and continue to effectively integrate #ai, specifically natural language processing (#NLP), into our clinical workflow to deliver high quality care to our patients with #valvular heart disease. Our algorithm is based on #echocardiographic data. The results?

⚠ Following implementation of our Echo-based, AI-driven clinical algorithm, both white and black patients saw an improvement in time to care & management of their severe aortic stenosis or severe mitral regurgitation, the improvement being more significant in black patients.

Want to hear more? Join us at the upcoming #EACVI conference in Barcelona in May 2023 to learn more during our presentation of our work. Special thanks to our indispensable Mpirik colleagues (looking at you Miguel Sotelo, PhD, Loren Wagner, Christopher Rogers) for the hard work!.

#innovation #patientcare #artificialintelligence

We share in the vision that data-driven solutions and artificial intelligence hold promise to solving these issues.

We’re extremely appreciative of our partners and customers who have been part of our journey thus far, and all those who will be part of this next chapter, working together to help patients and advance the quality of healthcare.
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description: #NEWS: Today, we announced that we’re welcoming Mpirik to the Tempus family. This acquisition significantly expands our portfolio of AI solutions that help physicians identify patients with undiagnosed or under treated cardiovascular disease and significantly scales deployment capabilities of these solutions to Mpirik’s provider network. To learn more, read on: https://tempus.co/3J6upbC

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_author_headline: Physician | Redesigning Healthcare | Transforming Delivery of Care
company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
#Redesigning_healthcare #48

"Where you live shouldn't determine whether you live or die"
- Bonno

Artificial Intelligence is not the cure to all, but certainly (one of many) means to the end: consistently high quality, equitable care for our communities.

❓ Is this doable?

✔️ Yes!

We have been and continue to effectively integrate #ai, specifically natural language processing (#NLP), into our clinical workflow to deliver high quality care to our patients with #valvular heart disease. Our algorithm is based on #echocardiographic data. The results?

⚠ Following implementation of our Echo-based, AI-driven clinical algorithm, both white and black patients saw an improvement in time to care & management of their severe aortic stenosis or severe mitral regurgitation, the improvement being more significant in black patients.

Want to hear more? Join us at the upcoming #EACVI conference in Barcelona in May 2023 to learn more during our presentation of our work. Special thanks to our indispensable Mpirik colleagues (looking at you Miguel Sotelo, PhD, Loren Wagner, Christopher Rogers) for the hard work!.

#innovation #patientcare #artificialintelligence

company_updates_collection.description:
AI in healthcare continues to naturally progress as new tools evolve. Mpirik firmly believes in technology and physicians enabling one another to solve for better patient care, specifically cardiac patients at risk. 

Read more in the JAMA Health Forum about how “Physicians’ knowledge and insights will remain an important complement to these powerful tools.”

https://lnkd.in/dsY_wbYh

Tune in to part 3 of Vizient, Inc's Modern Practice Podcast discussing AI and identifying the risk of sudden cardiac arrest.

https://lnkd.in/eXgipBrn

“The data of what the program has done so far has been pretty astounding….5 patients have received a device implant which wouldn’t have been done without having the program alert in place.” Dr. Sanjaya Gupta stated on Vizient, Inc's latest Modern Practice Podcast.

Tune in to part 2 of the podcast to hear more about how Mpirik uses #AI to identify patients at risk of sudden cardiac arrest.

https://lnkd.in/evpGuCq5

“Mpirik provides a great way to use AI to improve patient care, quality outcomes reducing death, and produce financial margins. So in many cases it’s really a home run..." Douglas Beinborn stated on Vizient, Inc's latest Modern Practice Podcast.

Tune in to part 1 of the podcast to hear more about how Mpirik uses #AI to identify patients at risk of sudden cardiac arrest. 

https://lnkd.in/dRDbabAw

Mpirik was honored to participate in Vizient, Inc's Innovative Technology Exchange earlier this month in Dallas TX! We believe utilizing technology is on the forefront of exceptional patient care and outcomes. 

Partner with Mpirik to learn more about how our AI identifies at-risk patients across the cardiovascular service line.

https://lnkd.in/gSE2zF7V

company_updates_collection.reshared_post_description:
October is Sudden Cardiac Arrest Awareness Month!

#SuddenCardiacArrest claims one life every 90 seconds and the likelihood of surviving is related to the speed of efforts to revive the heart, but half of sudden cardiac arrest victims won’t have someone nearby to help.

Help you patients under stand sudden cardiac arrest and quick actions they can do to help save lives with our #CardioSmart infographic ➡️ https://bit.ly/3olfz6Z
